name: Supply Closet
description: The Supply Closet is a small, dimly lit room tucked away in a corner of the reception area. The air inside is slightly musty, but the [air vent] keeps the smell from being overpowering. It is cluttered with various supplies and equipment, stacked haphazardly on a [shelf]. There is also a [cabinet] and [trash can] right next to it.
short_description: A small, dimly lit room filled with various supplies.
directions: The Supply Closet is connected to the Reception Area to the east.
